judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed; costs to be divided equally among the parties.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Horvitz, Appellant, v. Lowenthal.
Argued October 5, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
re-argument refused January 22, 1966.
Emerson G. Hess, with him Robert N. Peirce, Jr., and Hess, Hess and Bagley, for appellant.
David M. Kaufman, with him Herbert B. Sachs, for appellees.
November 9, 1965:
